---+++ Description
The puzzle starts with every peg occupied but the center. To make a move, a peg must be jumped and removed. The goal is to finish with fewest remaining pegs possible (ideally 1). No special marking or coloring of the board is needed.

---+++ Notes

   * Uses a common [[Game Board]]
      * Uses only the vertical and horizontal lines in the Game Board
   * May use tokens of the same color
